casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America Plaintiff—Appellee v. Richard T. SHEPHARD, Jr. Defendant—Appellant No. 00-6683. United States Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. July 26, 2002.

Before SUHRHEINRICH, SILER and GILMAN, Circuit Judges.

This cause having come on to be heard upon the record, the briefs and the oral argument of the parties, and upon due consideration thereof,

The court finds that no prejudicial error intervened in the judgment and proceedings in the district court, and it is there*784fore ORDERED that said judgment be and it hereby is affirmed.
